div.p: This value set includes all terms in SNOMED CT, IDC-10-AM, and CPT-4.
Open Issue: Due to CPT license conditions, the correct use of CPT-4 in FHIR cannot be described.

description.value: Encounter Diagnoses: a specific code indicating type of service provided: SNOMED CT, ICD-10-AM, or CPT
